message.content: {"steps":[{"output":"[KR] Step 1 [수열 $b_n$의 일반항 구하기]: $b_n = b_{n-1} + 2n$이고, $b_1 = 2$이므로, $b_n = 2(n+1)$이다.","explanation":"$b_1 = 2$, $b_2 = b_1 + 2 \\times 2 = 6$, $b_3 = b_2 + 2 \\times 3 = 12$, $b_4 = b_3 + 2 \\times 4 = 20$. 일반항은 $b_n = 2(n+1)$."},{"output":"[KR] Step 2 [일반항 $S_n$ 구하기]: $S_n = 2 \\times \\{(n-1)!\\}^2$이다.","explanation":"$S_n = b_n \\times S_{n-1}$이고, $b_n = 2(n+1)$이므로 $S_n = 2 \\times \\{(n-1)!\\}^2$."},{"output":"[KR] Step 3 [$a_n$의 일반항 구하기]: $a_n = 2(n^2 - 2n)\\{(n-2)!\\}^2$이다.","explanation":"$a_n = S_n - S_{n-1} = 2\\{(n-1)!\\}^2 - 2\\{(n-2)!\\}^2 = 2(n^2 - 2n)\\{(n-2)!\\}^2$."},{"output":"[KR] Step 4 [$f(n)$과 $g(n)$ 구하기]: $f(n) = 2$, $g(n) = 2(n^2 - 2n)$이다.","explanation":"(가)는 $f(n) = 2$, (나)는 $g(n) = 2(n^2 - 2n)$."},{"output":"[KR] Step 5 [$f(10) + g(6)$ 계산]: $f(10) = 2$, $g(6) = 48$, 따라서 $f(10) + g(6) = 50$이다.","explanation":"$f(10) = 2$, $g(6) = 2(6^2 - 2 \\times 6) = 48$, 따라서 $f(10) + g(6) = 50$."},{"output":"[EN] Step 1 [Finding the general term of sequence $b_n$]: $b_n = b_{n-1} + 2n$ and $b_1 = 2$, so $b_n = 2(n+1)$.","explanation":"$b_1 = 2$, $b_2 = b_1 + 2 \\times 2 = 6$, $b_3 = b_2 + 2 \\times 3 = 12$, $b_4 = b_3 + 2 \\times 4 = 20$. The general term is $b_n = 2(n+1)$."},{"output":"[EN] Step 2 [Finding the general term of $S_n$]: $S_n = 2 \\times \\{(n-1)!\\}^2$.","explanation":"Since $S_n = b_n \\times S_{n-1}$ and $b_n = 2(n+1)$, $S_n = 2 \\times \\{(n-1)!\\}^2$."},{"output":"[EN] Step 3 [Finding the general term of $a_n$]: $a_n = 2(n^2 - 2n)\\{(n-2)!\\}^2$.","explanation":"$a_n = S_n - S_{n-1} = 2\\{(n-1)!\\}^2 - 2\\{(n-2)!\\}^2 = 2(n^2 - 2n)\\{(n-2)!\\}^2$."},{"output":"[EN] Step 4 [Finding $f(n)$ and $g(n)$]: $f(n) = 2$, $g(n) = 2(n^2 - 2n)$.","explanation":"(가) is $f(n) = 2$, (나) is $g(n) = 2(n^2 - 2n)$."},{"output":"[EN] Step 5 [Calculating $f(10) + g(6)$]: $f(10) = 2$, $g(6) = 48$, so $f(10) + g(6) = 50$.","explanation":"$f(10) = 2$, $g(6) = 2(6^2 - 2 \\times 6) = 48$, so $f(10) + g(6) = 50$."}],"final_answer":"\\MC: boxed{2}"}
